attempts.output_sql:
SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM combined_cte
) AS tmp1
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN avg_quarterly_sales > 0
    THEN ABS(sum_sales - avg_quarterly_sales) / avg_quarterly_sales
    ELSE NULL
  END > 0.1
ORDER BY
  avg_quarterly_sales,
  sum_sales,
  i_manufact_id
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    i_manufact_id,
    SUM(ss_sales_price) AS sum_sales,
    AVG(SUM(ss_sales_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY i_manufact_id) AS avg_quarterly_sales
  FROM item, store_sales, filtered_dates, store
  WHERE
    ss_item_sk = i_item_sk
    AND ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk
    AND ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
    AND (
      (
        i_category IN ('Books', 'Children', 'Electronics')
        AND i_class IN ('personal', 'portable', 'reference', 'self-help')
        AND i_brand IN (
          'scholaramalgamalg #14',
          'scholaramalgamalg #7',
          'exportiunivamalg #9',
          'scholaramalgamalg #9'
        )
      )
      OR (
        i_category IN ('Women', 'Music', 'Men')
        AND i_class IN ('accessories', 'classical', 'fragrances', 'pants')
        AND i_brand IN ('amalgimporto #1', 'edu packscholar #1', 'exportiimporto #1', 'importoamalg #1')
      )
    )
  GROUP BY
    i_manufact_id,
    d_qoy
) AS tmp1
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN avg_quarterly_sales > 0
    THEN ABS(sum_sales - avg_quarterly_sales) / avg_quarterly_sales
    ELSE NULL
  END > 0.1
ORDER BY
  avg_quarterly_sales,
  sum_sales,
  i_manufact_id
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    i_manufact_id,
    SUM(ss_sales_price) AS sum_sales,
    AVG(SUM(ss_sales_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY i_manufact_id) AS avg_quarterly_sales
  FROM date_dim, store_sales, item, store
  WHERE
    ss_item_sk = i_item_sk
    AND ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk
    AND ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
    AND d_month_seq IN (
      1200,
      1200 + 1,
      1200 + 2,
      1200 + 3,
      1200 + 4,
      1200 + 5,
      1200 + 6,
      1200 + 7,
      1200 + 8,
      1200 + 9,
      1200 + 10,
      1200 + 11
    )
    AND (
      (
        i_category IN ('Books', 'Children', 'Electronics')
        AND i_class IN ('personal', 'portable', 'reference', 'self-help')
        AND i_brand IN (
          'scholaramalgamalg #14',
          'scholaramalgamalg #7',
          'exportiunivamalg #9',
          'scholaramalgamalg #9'
        )
      )
      OR (
        i_category IN ('Women', 'Music', 'Men')
        AND i_class IN ('accessories', 'classical', 'fragrances', 'pants')
        AND i_brand IN ('amalgimporto #1', 'edu packscholar #1', 'exportiimporto #1', 'importoamalg #1')
      )
    )
  GROUP BY
    i_manufact_id,
    d_qoy
) AS tmp1
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN avg_quarterly_sales > 0
    THEN ABS(sum_sales - avg_quarterly_sales) / avg_quarterly_sales

  END > 0.1
ORDER BY

LIMIT 100

select * from 
(select i_manufact_id,
sum(ss_sales_price) sum_sales,
avg(sum(ss_sales_price)) over (partition by i_manufact_id) avg_quarterly_sales
from item, store_sales, date_dim, store
where ss_item_sk = i_item_sk and
ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk and
ss_store_sk = s_store_sk and
d_month_seq in (1200,1200+1,1200+2,1200+3,1200+4,1200+5,1200+6,1200+7,1200+8,1200+9,1200+10,1200+11) and
((i_category in ('Books','Children','Electronics') and
i_class in ('personal','portable','reference','self-help') and
i_brand in ('scholaramalgamalg #14','scholaramalgamalg #7',
		'exportiunivamalg #9','scholaramalgamalg #9'))
or(i_category in ('Women','Music','Men') and
i_class in ('accessories','classical','fragrances','pants') and
i_brand in ('amalgimporto #1','edu packscholar #1','exportiimporto #1',
		'importoamalg #1')))
group by i_manufact_id, d_qoy ) tmp1
where case when avg_quarterly_sales > 0 
	then abs (sum_sales - avg_quarterly_sales)/ avg_quarterly_sales 
	else null end > 0.1
order by avg_quarterly_sales,
	 sum_sales,
	 i_manufact_id
 LIMIT 100

SELECT
  mqs.i_manufact_id,
  mqs.quarterly_sales AS sum_sales,
  mas.avg_quarterly_sales
FROM manufacturer_quarterly_sales AS mqs
JOIN manufacturer_avg_sales AS mas
  ON mqs.i_manufact_id = mas.i_manufact_id
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN mas.avg_quarterly_sales > 0
    THEN ABS(mqs.quarterly_sales - mas.avg_quarterly_sales) / mas.avg_quarterly_sales
    ELSE NULL
  END > 0.1
ORDER BY
  mas.avg_quarterly_sales,
  mqs.quarterly_sales,
  mqs.i_manufact_id
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    i_manufact_id,
    SUM(ss_sales_price) AS sum_sales,
    AVG(SUM(ss_sales_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY i_manufact_id) AS avg_quarterly_sales
  FROM item
  JOIN store_sales ON ss_item_sk = i_item_sk
  JOIN date_dim ON ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk

      (

        AND i_class IN ('accessories', 'classical', 'fragrances', 'pants')
        AND i_brand IN ('amalgimporto #1', 'edu packscholar #1', 'exportiimporto #1', 'importoamalg #1')
      )
    )
  GROUP BY
    i_manufact_id,
    d_qoy

  CASE
    WHEN avg_quarterly_sales > 0
    THEN ABS(sum_sales - avg_quarterly_sales) / avg_quarterly_sales
    ELSE NULL
  END > 0.1
ORDER BY
  avg_quarterly_sales,
  sum_sales,
  i_manufact_id
LIMIT 100
